饎饎饎

Related Character(s): 𩜮, 糦
Связанный символ (и): 𩜮, 糦

饎字的基本解释

饎
xī
熟食：“吉蠲为饎，是用孝享。”
黍稷；粮食。
炊，做饭：“饎爨在西壁。”

饎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》昌志切，去志，昌。］
“喜3”的被通假字。
(1)酒食。
(2)炊；煮。

饎字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　饎； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1425第29
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?昌志切，音熾。【爾雅·釋訓】饎，酒食也。【註】猶今云饎饌，皆一語而兼通。【疏】饎，一字通酒食兩名也。李巡云：得酒食則喜歡也。【詩·小雅】吉蠲爲饎，是用孝享。　又【玉篇】黍稷也。【儀禮·特牲饋食禮】主婦視饎爨于西堂下。【註】炊黍稷曰饎。　又【集韻】虛其切，音僖。義同。　【集韻】或作???糦喜?。【正韻】亦作?。

饎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
饎字的起名意思

暂无。

饎
Basic explanation of words
饎
xī
Cooked food: "Auspicious food is the sake of filial piety and enjoyment."
Millet; food.
Cooking, cooking: "Yuan Cuan is on the west wall."
饎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guang Yun" Chang Zhi cut, go to Zhi, Chang. ]
"Hi 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Food and drink.
(2) Cooking; cooking.
饎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Food Character Department】　饎; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1425 29
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Chang Zhi cut, Yin Chi. [Erya·Shixun] Barefoot, wine and food. [Note] It's still the same as today's delicious food, all in one word. 【Sparse】Two people can eat and drink with one word. Li Xunyun: If you get food and drink, you like it. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Ji Juan serves as piety and enjoys filial piety.　[Jade articles] Millet also. 【Rituals·Special Sacrifice Feeding Ceremony】The housewife regards her as she is in the west hall. 【Note】Cooking millet is called 饎.　[Jiyun] Void and cut, sound and sound. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】Or as ?????? [Zheng Yun] also made?.
